org.jhotdraw.framework
Interface Locator

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable, Storable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLocator
public interface Locator
extends Storable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

Locators can be used to locate a position on a figure.

Design Patterns

Strategy
Locator encapsulates the strategy to locate a handle on a figure.

<$CURRENT_VERSION$>
